/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street itself is a vibrant display of urban life, lined with lush green trees that provide a stark contrast to the clear blue sky above. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different shapes and colors navigate the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire landscape and enhancing the colors of the scene.
